name: SetNonce
shortDescription: Shortcut for setting Bootnonce. On first run (and after each update (will fix this later)) type: setnonce_setup into terminal (please run as root).After that your nonce will be set automatically After each rejailbreak. Please thank @2klasic for „bothering“ me to package this and @qwertyoruiopz for giving me the hint for automatation. No warranty. Partial UNTESTED. Only work if NvRam is patched. If no Problems occur the last update.
author: @if0xxx
